snippet: Xiang Nanfu, 62, is accused of fabricating stories about topics including organ harvesting and police beatings. His detention is the latest in hundreds of arrests in a crackdown on expression on the Internet.
abstract: Xiang Nanfu, 62, is accused of fabricating stories about topics including organ harvesting and police beatings. His detention is the latest in hundreds of arrests in a crackdown on expression on the Internet.

headline.main: Chinese Police Detain Contributor to U.S.-Based Website

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China
